--- title: "titanic" date: 2025-03-16 categories: ["machine learning"] --- ![](/img/stat-thumb.jpg){.post-thumbnail} ## Data 이해 ::: {#cbd835d7 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns import warnings warnings.filterwarnings('ignore') train = pd.read_csv('_data/train.csv') test = pd.read_csv('_data/test.csv') ``` ::: ::: {#c9976fc9 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} train.describe() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: - Age 결측치 86개 - Fare 결측치 1개: 이 정도는 그냥 삭제해도 될듯 ::: {#3488f979 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10)) # Age 분포 확인 plt.subplot(2, 2, 1) sns.boxplot(x='Survived', y='Age', data=train) plt.title('Age 분포 (생존 여부별)') # Fare 분포 확인 plt.subplot(2, 2, 2) sns.boxplot(x='Survived', y='Fare', data=train) plt.title('Fare 분포 (생존 여부별)') # Pclass에 따른 Age 분포 plt.subplot(2, 2, 3) sns.boxplot(x='Pclass', y='Age', data=train) plt.title('Age 분포 (객실 등급별)') # Pclass에 따른 Fare 분포 plt.subplot(2, 2, 4) sns.boxplot(x='Pclass', y='Fare', data=train) plt.title('Fare 분포 (객실 등급별)') plt.tight_layout() plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](00_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-1.png){width=1430 height=950} ::: ::: ::: {#533e0f27 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} train_x = train.drop('Survived', axis=1).values train_y = train['Survived'].values test_x = test.values ``` :::
